thread.title: Donald Trump gives presidential approval to Keystone XL oil pipeline
thread.title_full: Donald Trump gives presidential approval to Keystone XL oil pipeline

author: Andrew Buncombe
title: Donald Trump gives presidential approval to Keystone XL oil pipeline
text:
12:01 GMT Click to followThe Independent US 
Donald Trump has given a presidential permit to the controversial Keystone XL pipeline project, a major hurdle for Canada-based developer TransCanada. 
Environmentalists have objected to the construction of the 875-mile line, which would carry up to 830,000 barrels of oil a day. It requires presidential approval because it will cross the US's northern international border. 
More follows
